document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">foolish, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">call </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">"flowers" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Need </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">wiser, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">tell? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Savans </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">"Classify" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">well! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">read </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">"Revelations" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Must </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">criticize </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">read </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">same </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">Edition </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">With </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">beclouded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Eyes! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">stand </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Old </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">"Moses" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">"Canaan" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">denied </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Scan </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">him, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">stately </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">landscape </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">side </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Doubtless, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">deem </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">superfluous </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Many </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Sciences, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">pursued </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">learned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Angels </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">scholastic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">skies! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Low </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">amid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">glad </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">Belles </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">lettres </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Grant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">we </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">stand </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff04c4">Stars, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">amid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">profound </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Galaxies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">grand </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Right </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">hand"! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: If the foolish call them "flowers"
